    • Constructor Detail

      • Paper

        public Paper(User author,
     java.lang.String title,
     java.lang.String keywords,
     java.lang.String paperAbstract,
     java.lang.String filePath)
        Public constructor. Initializes all fields. title, keywords, abstract and filepath are all required.
        Parameters:
        title - the title of the Paper.
        keywords - keywords for this Paper
        paperAbstract - paper's abstract
        filePath - local filePath.

    • Method Detail

      • setAccepted

        public void setAccepted(Approval decision)
        Sets the PCs acceptance of this paper for the conference
        Parameters:
        decision - PC's decision

      • getDecision

        public Approval getDecision()
        Returns the PCs decision
        Returns:
        Approval the PCs decision

      • review

        public void review(User reviewer,
          Review newReview)
        Adds a Reviewer, Review pair to the reviewerMap. If the Review is null, this indicates that the reviewer has been assigned but there is no review done yet.
        Parameters:
        reviewer - Reviewer either assigned to the paper or who did this review
        newReview - Review if it is complete. Null otherwise.

      • setSPC

        public void setSPC(User spc)
        Assigns an SPC to this paper
        Parameters:
        spc - the new SPC for this paper

      • getReviews

        public java.util.List<Review> getReviews()
        Returns all of the available reviews done on this paper. Resulting list will have all nulls removed.
        Returns:
        List all completed reviews.

      • getAuthor

        public User getAuthor()
        getter for the author of this Paper
        Returns:
        The author as a User

      • isAReviewer

        public boolean isAReviewer(User rev)
        This method checks whether a user is a reviewer assigned to this paper
        Parameters:
        rev - The user to be checked
        Returns:
        True if the user is a reviewer assigned to this paper

      • getSPC

        public User getSPC()
        Getter for the Sub-Program Chair of this paper
        Returns:
        The user that is the SPC
